thread.title: The Internet Is Having Way Too Much Fun Making Vines Featuring Adeles Hello
thread.title_full: The Internet Is Having Way Too Much Fun Making Vines Featuring Adeles Hello

title: The Internet Is Having Way Too Much Fun Making Vines Featuring Adeles Hello
text:
The Internet Is Having Way Too Much Fun Making Vines Featuring Adele's "Hello" 
E online Saturday 24th October, 2015 
have you listened to it? Is it more or less than 50? If you are under 50, then get on our level because Adele needs your 24/7 attention!Eventually, you'll get your breath back after the sheer force of Adele's powerful voice knocks the wind right out of you, and you can enjoy these Vines that feature "Hello." Basically, the Internet is having way too much fun playing around with the phone call, the lyrics and just the fact that Adele is back and single-handedly saving the music industry. And thus, she is saving us all. 
...
